post_content:
One off back FS. Price is net to me and delivered with tracking. SOLD here or via PM trumps any offers or on-going negotiations.

SGC 3 Bob Bescher portrait Sovereign 350 back. Decent centering, nice color, clean card. $105 ***SOLD***

Thanks for looking!
